item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 13
item.description:
Issued at 0900Z TUE SEP 09 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  13
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
0900Z TUE SEP 09 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 19.1N  45.7W AT 09/0900Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  15 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST-NORTHWEST OR 300 DEGREES AT  12 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  948 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 115 KT WITH GUSTS TO 140 KT.
64 KT....... 30NE  20SE  20SW  30NW.
50 KT.......100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT.......150NE 100SE  75SW 150NW.
12 FT SEAS..175NE 150SE 150SW 175NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 19.1N  45.7W AT 09/0900Z
AT 09/0600Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 18.9N  45.2W
 
FORECAST VALID 09/1800Z 19.8N  47.5W
MAX WIND 120 KT...GUSTS 145 KT.
64 KT... 30NE  20SE  20SW  30NW.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE  75SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 10/0600Z 20.3N  49.4W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS 155 KT.
64 KT... 30NE  20SE  20SW  30NW.
50 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  75NW.
34 KT...125NE 100SE 100SW 125NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 10/1800Z 20.3N  51.3W
MAX WIND 120 KT...GUSTS 145 KT.
64 KT... 30NE  20SE  20SW  30NW.
50 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  75NW.
34 KT...125NE 100SE 100SW 125NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 11/0600Z 20.0N  53.3W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
50 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  75NW.
34 KT...125NE 100SE 100SW 125NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 12/0600Z 19.5N  56.5W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
50 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  75NW.
34 KT...125NE 100SE 100SW 125NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 13/0600Z 20.0N  59.5W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 14/0600Z 21.0N  63.0W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 19.1N  45.7W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 09/1500Z
 
FORECASTER LAWRENCE
